name: Pink-Dubkidz L.E.D. Watch
description:
This watch has a deeper meaning that meets the eye.

Now you are probably wondering what in the heck does "L.E.D."mean?
L.E.D. stands for (Light Emitting Diode)
This is a Diode which emits light, pretty simple huh? Well, if not I will go deeper into the explanation.

A "Diode" is a device that allows electricity to flow in one direction.
If the electricity were to travel in the opposite direction, the whole device would be destroyed.
Almost like a water valve that prevents water from flowing in the wrong direction.
This Diode is connected to a power source and just like magic, light is now being emitted through it.

Now that you have a simple understanding of a L.E.D., it is time to relate this to life.

We as humans are like Diodes placed into the universe.
We are placed into the present and we can only move to the future but never back to the past.
We as humans tend to think about negative past events that we have experienced in our lives and love to hold on to them. This is what disables us to succeed to the future.
Just like the diode, it will destroy us if we were to move in the opposite direction. We must continue to flow in one direction in life.

If this watch has called you today, you must understand and accept that the more we stay in the past (in our minds) we cannot progress to the future.

So join us and make the conscience decision to Let go of the Past and look forward to a better future!

name: Purple "IceCreamKidz" Tee
description:
Welcome to the Home of the Icecream Kidz, where everything is Sweet and Tasty! 

The Purple Icecream Kid wants you to understand that your reality is just an illusion and you as a creator has full creative control over it.
Life is nothing but a Canvas and you are the Paintbrush. 

The Purple Icecream kid wants you to channel your inner child where every thought is sugar coated and delicious.

In life there is always something sweet to experience, but we must make the mental shift in order to see the tasty treats that we have waiting for us.

If the Purple Icecream Kid has called upon you as a rightful owner today, make the pledge with us and Shift your thoughts to ones that are of a positive and loving nature.

You are of Royalty
-Dubkidz

name: Red "DUBKIDZ" Tee
description:
This Dubkidz design tells a story with over a million words. We wanted to keep the simplicity on this design the main focus. So to start off we have the outline of the Dubkidz Text and inside we have the main attention focused to the color Red But lets go deeper into this design. The outline of "DUBKIDZ" symbolizes that the outer shell of anything is only an illusion, but what counts lies within. Any desired feeling must start from the inside, nothing on the external can influence our change. We must make the conscience decision to start feeling Now in this very moment. The reason for us choosing the color Red is because the color Red symbolizes:

  • Love

  • Energy

  • Adventure

If this shirt has chosen you to be a rightful owner today, you must understand and accept the meaning behind its calling.

  1. You must understand and accept that you are just a reflection of everyone you meet, so you must show Love to everything and everyone you come in contact with.

  2. You must understand and accept that you as a human is made up of pure positive energy. Everything you do from this point should be of a positive nature that can and will benefit humanity.

  3. You must understand and accept that your reality is nothing more but a Big Adventure, so have some fun and smile more! You create your reality and Adventure.

"What you think, So you are" -Dubkidz Add this to your Dubkidz Collection!

name: Pink "Ice Cream Kidz" Tee
description:
Welcome to the Home of the Icecream Kidz, where everything is Sweet and Tasty! 

The Pink Icecream Kid teaches lessons of compassion and Unconditional Love. In order to receive, we must first give with our hearts.

In color psychology, pink is a sign of hope, that is what the Pink Icecream Kid wants to teach us. No matter what you have going on in life, just understand that it never rains forever. The sun will shine again, just hold Hope in your hearts.

If we are going through rough times the easiest ways to get our minds off of our own problems is to go and help someone else or just be there to listen. At that moment you will clearly see that your problems are probably incomparable to theirs.

If the Pink Icecream Kid has called upon you as a rightful friend and owner today, you must make the pledge with us and Shift your hearts to be open to compassion and unconditional love.

Love is the cure to any sickness
 -Dubkidz!

name: "Dub is King" Tee
description:
Rightfully "Dub" yourself anything and everything that you are.
We are all Kings and Queens at heart and nobody can tell you other wise.

In the Middle Ages King and Lords would hold a "Dubbing" ceremony. The squire was the focus of attention because today would be the day that he would upgrade and become a Knight. The squire had to prove himself worthy unto his King or Lord to get upgraded to the next level.

If this particular Dubkidz shirt has chosen you as a rightful owner today, you must Prove worthyness unto yourself and for now own treat your self like a King or Queen.

Much Love, 
-Dubkidz

name: Blue "Ice Cream Kidz" Tee
description:
Welcome to the Home of the Icecream Kidz, where everything is Sweet and Tasty! 

In color psychology blue symbolizes Relaxation,Truth and Communication.
The Blue Icecream Kid wants to send us the message that we must learn to relax and laugh a little bit more. 
At times life might seem depressing and going into a endless spiral to nowhere, but know and understand that every second that you are alive is a true blessing! Imagine all of the people that have "Passed On", they would love to be in your spot still breathing the fresh air in this beautiful world. 

Or even imagine all of the sick kids in the hospital that have to spend 80% of their time in the medical beds. They would love to be in your shoes right now, all they would want is a fully functional healthy body. They wouldn't care about the bad situations at hand because they understand at any moment they could be running through the tall grassy fields while feeling the suns warming presence. 

The last message the Blue Icecream Kid wants to send to us is the message of the Truth. The truth will always lead us to a more positive and easier life. Trust Me!
No matter what, always tell the truth! The worst thing is having something come back to you that you lied about and this time it will be 10 Times Worst!

The Truth will literally Set You Free!

If the Blue Icecream Kid has chosen you to be a fellow friend and rightful owner today, you must understand and accept with us that nothing is permanent and everything changes. The Bad days will end and the Great Days are already here. We must stop and relax to see the good in every aspect of life.

So just relax a little bit more and communicate with people only about the positive.

Calm the Mind and the rest will follow
 -Dubkidz!

name: Purple "DUBKIDZ" Tee
description:
This Dubkidz design tells a story with over a million words. We wanted to keep the simplicity on this design the main focus. So to start off we have the outline of the Dubkidz Text and inside we have the main attention focused to the color Purple. But lets go deeper into this design.   • Rarity

  • Luxury

  • Royalty

  • The Sub-Conscience Mind

If this shirt has chosen you to be a rightful owner today, you must understand and accept the meaning behind its calling.

  1. You must understand and accept that you are a Rare individual

  2. You must understand and accept that for now on you will live a Luxurious life

  3. You must understand and accept that you are of Royalty

  4. You must understand and accept that you are an extension of your own Sub-Conscience Mind

"What you think, So you are" -Dubkidz Add this to your Dubkidz Collection!

name: Dubkidz 4th Dimensional Bear Tee
description:
We at Dubkidz want to present the "4th Dimensional Bear". 

The bear has a lesson to teach us all, so hold our hands and jump out of the 3rd dimension!

The Bear is a animal of Courage, Strength and Leadership.
This bear is not like the average everyday bear you might see in the forest. The bear is just an illusion that he wants you to see at this very moment.

He wants to teach us the lesson of courage, strength and leadership.
He tells us that the way we look is just an illusion. Big, small, short or tall. It is nothing but a mere illusion!

What counts is what lies within us. You don't have to be the strongest person around to have courage, strength and leadership abilities. We must tell ourselves Who and What we are.

In history there was a countless amount of leaders that had loads and loads of strength and courage that appeared to short or weak.

Lets take "Alexander the Great" for an illustration.
Alexander the Great was 5"7, pretty shirt huh? But as the Bear said earlier, physical appearance is only a illusion.
Alexander was the Great King of Macedonia who conquered an empire that stretched from the Balkans to modern-day Pakistan.

But how far of a distance is that? Let me paint that picture in your head for you.

Balkans to Pakistan is roughly around 1,070 miles long. By foot that journey would take roughly around 334 hours not including all the stops they had to take. 
Even though some of the men had horse but they can only travel so far as well. Horses can travel around 20-30 miles a day, so that would equate to anywhere around 50 days to travel 1000 miles by a horse.

I really hope that put everything into perspective on the long and hard journey Alexander the Great had to take, and we didn't even include the battles they had faced trying to take over the land! 

All of that was lead by a man that was 5"7, but his strength and courage was way taller than that inside. 

If the 4th Dimensional Bear has chosen you to be a partner on his universal journey you must for now on see that no matter what size you are the inside is what is measured.

Courage is the most effective solution to any Fear
-Dubkidz
